ygData.subject: Re: Also...
ygData.msgSnippet: Large sowing kit holds 8 slots....Found in The inn for sure in oasis.. Maybe rivervale but I thought the small kit is 4 maybe im mistaken Bismatal ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Large sowing kit holds 8 slots....Found in The inn for sure in oasis.. Maybe
rivervale but I thought the small kit is 4 maybe im mistaken

Bismatal
----- Original Message -----
From: Garza, Russell <r.garza@...>

Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Also...


> From: "Garza, Russell" <r.garza@...>
>
> So, you are saying that you need 2 silks to make a swatch...
> and you need two swatches, and a pattern to make the tunic and leggings...
>
> Well, my sewing kit has only 2 slots. How can I combine 2 swatches and a
> pattern if I only have 2 slots in my kit?
>
> Do you need a different kit to make this armor?
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: ablair@... [mailto:ablair@...]

> Subject: [EQ-Monks] Also...
